handlers.code:
system.print("=== SEARCHING ENTIRE CONSTRUCT ===")
system.print("")

local allElements = core.getElementIdList()
system.print("Total elements on construct: " .. #allElements)
system.print("")

local containerHubs = 0
local containerGroups = 0
local itemContainers = 0

for _, id in ipairs(allElements) do
    local elementType = core.getElementTypeById(id)
    
    if string.match(elementType, "ContainerHub") then
        containerHubs = containerHubs + 1
        local name = core.getElementNameById(id)
        system.print("ContainerHub: " .. name .. " (ID: " .. id .. ")")
    elseif string.match(elementType, "ContainerGroup") then
        containerGroups = containerGroups + 1
        local name = core.getElementNameById(id)
        system.print("ContainerGroup: " .. name .. " (ID: " .. id .. ")")
    elseif elementType == "ItemContainer" then
        itemContainers = itemContainers + 1
    end
end

system.print("")
system.print("=== SUMMARY ===")
system.print("ContainerHubs: " .. containerHubs)
system.print("ContainerGroups: " .. containerGroups)
system.print("ItemContainers: " .. itemContainers)
system.print("")

if containerHubs > 0 or containerGroups > 0 then
    system.print("You HAVE ContainerHubs/Groups!")
    system.print("Link them to the programming board slots.")
else
    system.print("NO ContainerHubs/Groups on construct.")
    system.print("Your hardware uses ItemContainers only.")
    system.print("The original code won't work - need different approach.")
end

unit.exit()
